name: Goblins! (itch)
description:
Soft round humans have shinies. Take the shinies!!!

This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 33

Programming:
Paul Schwarzwalder
Phoenix Smith

Sound Effects:
Phoenix Smith
Paul Schwarzwalder

Art and Animation:
Phoenix Smith

Level Design:
Jami Schwarzwalder
Paul Schwarzwalder
Phoenix Smith
